posts.name: Pradeep Kumar P
posts.cooked:
Hi, Could you please share TDS live sessions recordings? i dont find it in youtube channel or in the calendar.

Thanks

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
Hi Kumar,

This is the TDS channel and the current playlist.
Currently it has only the first TA session released 9 days ago.

Unfortunately we have only a partial recording of the previous TA session (last Sunday, 6th oct). It largely covered some of the GA0 material and some general topics.

Tomorrowâ€™s session (13th Oct) will be more substantial as it will get into the material that will almost certainly be tested in the ROE.

If we feel there is value in the partial recording then we will release it, but for the moment, i think most of it will get subsumed into what will be explained by tomorrows session.

We also usually add more sessions as it warrants if we percieve that more time is needed to cover some of the topics.

Week 1 has been largely self explanatory with regards to getting familiar with the tools. There was a small section in the previous recording that i might still release, which showcased how to get started with vscode, setting up a virtual environment and some useful extensions. (But if you are already familiar with that and had no trouble with week 0 then the recording is of little value to you).

Kind regards

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
Hi Haifa,

Only the instructor is able to share instructor recordings (at their discretion). I have made them aware that students have requested the recordings.

Kind regards

posts.name: Haifa
posts.cooked: Thank you so much Noted

posts.name: Haifa
posts.cooked:
The new TA sessions or instructions sessions are still not accessible. Please do the needful.
Thank you

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
Hi Haifa,

The instructor (who is the only person authorised to publish the videos) has been informed.

Kind regards

posts.name: Haifa
posts.cooked:
Sir, i would like to bring to your notice that the sessions are not yet available. Also the TA sessions from 17th Oct.
It would of great help for the quiz and project.
Thank you.

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
Hi Haifa,

All the videos that have been recorded so far, except Thurs 17th (we are still working on making it available), and Sun 20th are available on the TDS You Tube Channel.

YouTube

Tools in Data Science

Share your videos with friends, family, and the world

Regards

posts.name: Haifa
posts.cooked: Yes TA sessions upto 13th are visible. The instructor sessions are not
